sn4.4:1.2: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Bārāṇasī in the Deer Park at Isipatana.
sn4.4:1.3: There the Blessed One addressed the bhikkhus thus:
sn4.4:2.1: “Bhikkhus, by careful attention, by careful right striving, I have arrived at unsurpassed liberation, I have realized unsurpassed liberation.
sn4.4:2.2: You too, bhikkhus, by careful attention, by careful right striving, must arrive at unsurpassed liberation, must realize unsurpassed liberation. ”
sn4.4:2.3: Then Māra the Evil One approached the Blessed One and addressed him in verse:
sn4.4:3.3: You are bound by Māra’s bondage:
sn4.4:4.3: I am freed from Māra’s bondage:
sn4.4:5.1: Then Māra the Evil One … disappeared right there.
